snippet: James (Whitey) Bulger will take the stand and claim the government gave him immunity from prosecution, his lawyer said.
abstract: James (Whitey) Bulger, the feared Boston mob boss accused of committing 19 murders, will take the stand at his own trial and, in a highly unusual defense strategy, will claim the government gave him immunity from prosecution.
lead_paragraph: James (Whitey) Bulger will take the stand and claim the government gave him immunity from prosecution, his lawyer said.

headline.seo: Bulger, Boston Mob Boss, to Speak at His Own Trial
headline.main: Mob Figure Plans to Testify in His Own Defense at Trial
headline.print_headline: Mob Figure Plans to Testify In His Own Defense at Trial
